Why Tailwind CSS is Amazing

The utility-first CSS framework that will change the way you build websites.

What is Tailwind CSS?

Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework packed with classes like flex, pt-4, text-center, and rotate-90 that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.

It allows you to rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML. Tailwind CSS is highly customizable, responsive, and easy to use.

Why Use Tailwind CSS?

Utility-First

Tailwind provides low-level utility classes that let you build completely custom designs without writing CSS.

Responsive Design

Easily build responsive designs using Tailwind's responsive utility variants.

Customizable

Tailwind is highly customizable. You can configure colors, fonts, and more in the tailwind.config.js file.

Get Started with Tailwind CSS

Getting started with Tailwind CSS is easy. You can install it via npm or use the CDN to quickly add it to your project. 

npm install tailwindcss
